Description: Poor intersection with inadequate lights. Usually congested with a large number of trucks. Recent upgrade was cheap and pitiful, and made the intersection more unsafe as the lanes merge sooner.

Main risk: Vehicles travel over the speed limit
Description: Lord St (between Gnangara Rd & Reid Hwy) is where Main Roads is carrying out roadworks.  The main posted speed limits are 40 or 60 km/h.  Everyone seems to be doing at least 80 km/h which is obviously 20-40 km over the posted speed limits.  THE POLICE NEED TO HAVE A VERY HIGH PRESENCE IN THE AREA.
